---
title: "Women in Work Force"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r} 
#Importing Data Set
ss14pusa = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)  # read csv file
ss14pusb = read.csv(file.choose(),header=TRUE)

```

```{r}
attach(ss14pusa)
names(ss14pusa)
ss14pusa_edit = data.frame(SEX,FSEXP,OCCP,FOCCP,WKHP,FWKHP,MAR,FMARP,WAGP,FWAGP,SCHL,FSCHLP,ESP,FOD1P,SCHL,FSCHL)
detach(ss14pusa)

attach(ss14pusb)
ss14pusb_edit = data.frame(SEX,FSEXP,OCCP,FOCCP,WKHP,FWKHP,MAR,FMARP,WAGP,FWAGP,SCHL,FSCHLP,ESP,FOD1P,SCHL,FSCHL)
detach(ss14pusb)

Data = rbind(ss14pusa_edit,ss14pusb_edit)
Data

write.csv(Data, file = "Data.csv",row.names=TRUE)
```
